{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with HARRIS TRANSPORT.

Across 133 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 19 have at least one amendment (14%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 3% and the average number of amendments was 1.11. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$777.2K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.04 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$158.3K. The longest contract was 0.54 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$5.5M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
